taskbody.context: To avoid data synchronization issues, it is recommended to clear all read-only flags from your project.

step.cmd: In the DS Navigator view pane, right-click on the project in which you want to clear the read-only flag.

step.stepresult: The Location field displays the location of the project.

step.cmd: Open Windows Explorer and paste the copied location.
Right-click on the desired project folder and select Properties.
In the Attributes field, uncheck the Read-only box.

step.stepresult: The Confirm Attribute Changes windows is displayed.

step.cmd: Leave the checkmark on Apply changes to this folder, subfolders and files.
In the DS Navigator view pane, select the same project, and then select File Refresh .
